preference.name: RDV_QSEARCH_REFINE
preference.preference_description: Enables the use of TruShape data to refine Design Context searches. This preference applies only if you use the cacheless search engine. Users can select the Refine Cacheless Search-> Use True Shape Search user option to change this setting for their own searches. Valid Values: true - Spatial searches in Design Context use TruShape and bounding box data. false - Spatial searches in Design Context use bounding box data, not TruShape data.
